docs.text: in times of crisis people are driven to desperate measures .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course what constitutes a crisis differs from person to person .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what may be a disastrous situation for one , may be seen as a challenge to another .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as deepak chopra is known to say , " it's not the ride , it's the rider . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately clear-thinking is not always the reaction to problems .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: wall street wheeler dealer steven taylor ( michael douglas ) is a man with troubles .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's sunk his money in illegal financial activities and it's blown up in his face .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in a matter of days he will lose it all .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his wife emily ( gwyneth paltrow ) is a highly-placed un interpreter and is not happy with her life either .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: her marriage is cold and unfulfilling .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unknown to her , her new lover david shaw ( viggo mortensen ) is not only a painter , but an ex-con with a history of bilking wealthy women of their money .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: emily is a prime target : she's worth over $100 million .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: steven's solution to his predicament is to offer david half a million to kill his wife .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the artist accepts and the movie is underway .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: drawing from frederick knott's play and loosely based on hitchcock's dial m for murder , this is all-too typical of summer releases .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: all style and no substance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and there's really not much style .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director andrew davis ( the accomplished witness and best-forgotten other films ) has made exactly the wrong choices at almost every turn .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: douglas and paltrow have both shown us that they are skillful actors in previous films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mortensen showed promise in the past .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: here all three are walking uninterestingly through their roles with oddly waxen faces .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only person who shows any sense of life is david suchet as new york detective mohamed karaman .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's only on-screen long enough to make you think that there might be a likable person in the film and then he disappears .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the first concern of a suspense film is to create suspense .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: surprises are important .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in this movie the audience keeps waiting for something to happen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and nothing ever does .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: nearly every event is telegraphed in advance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: close-up on this object or that action and it's easy to guess what's going to happen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as the film plods towards its inevitable conclusion you keep expecting a plot twist to make the movie worthwhile .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's a hopeless quest .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story doesn't make much sense .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: steven's wife is loaded .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even with unfriendly relations , you'd think that he could have talked to her about his difficulty rather than deciding to kill her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when he does decide on the dire plan he makes an unreasonable choice .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you were going to hire someone to kill your wife , would your first choice be her lover ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: no matter how sleazy he is , i would think there might be a chance that he would turn down the opportunity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why would steven plan the murder as a break-in in their apartment ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why not just take her out as she was walking to david's loft in a bad neighborhood ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while deciding among the numerous summer films , you might do well to skip this one .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you'll find more suspense than this movie offers by watching the weather channel .
docs.label: negative
